meaningMnemonic: An <radical>axe</radical> is stuck into the <radical>ground</radical> on a <kanji>hill</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You reach the top of the <kanji>hill</kanji> and realize the entire hill is covered in <reading>cu</reading>cumbers (きゅう). The axe has a little note on it that says "Cucumber Hill Axe - Please Use."
